remarks: Sufficient condition for elementhood in the set ` L ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)
statement:
itg2val.1 $e |- L = { x | E. g e. dom S.1 ( g oR <_ F /\ x = ( S.1 ` g ) ) } $.
itg2lr $p |- ( ( G e. dom S.1 /\ G oR <_ F ) -> ( S.1 ` G ) e. L ) $.
$d F g x $.
$d G g x $.
$d g x $.
